web-design.name: The Suite Spot Salon
web-design.short-summary: A salon website where users can conveniently book appointments, purchase items from the shop, and manage their accounts.
web-design.summary: The Suite Spot Salon is a fictitious salon suite client developed by our team for our senior design project. Recognizing the importance of booking features in the salon industry, we aimed to address this gap in the market. Our website allows users to conveniently book appointments, purchase items from the shop, and manage their accounts.
tasks: Collaborated with a team to create low-fi and hi-fi prototypes
Implemented mobile-first design approach with two hi-fi prototypes
Generated comprehensive documentation outlining the design process
Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
Conducted user testings to improve design

web-design.name: Noodletopia
web-design.short-summary: a mobile application designed for noodle enthusiasts, offering a personalized experience for ordering and creating customized noodle bowls with various toppings.
web-design.summary: Noodletopia is a mobile application designed for noodle enthusiasts, offering a personalized experience for ordering and creating customized noodle bowls with various toppings. Users have the freedom to add reviews for their noodle creations and share their unique combinations with others. Additionally, they can save their favorite noodle bowls for easy access.
tasks: Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
Conducted user testings throughout hi-fi development to improve design

web-design.name: Flashcard App
web-design.short-summary: A Simple flash card app where users can create, edit, delete, and learn cards.
web-design.summary: A Simple flash card app where users can create, edit, delete, and learn cards.
tasks: Ensured consistency and accessibility throughout the design phase
